promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic hawk normal-type pokemon wearing diamond armor. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or hawk. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemfeather, a a gigantic basic hawk normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Assault Boom. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "hawk", "normal" or "Gemfeather". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, hawk-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: This majestic avian, a staple in rural settings, emits a dazzling explosion with Assault Boom. It shines bright amidst homes.
